languages.text: "Всего несколько слов. "Лилламед. Оденат-XI. Ветра утихли. Исполнено". Лилламед — это и есть сигнатура Войгтвира для особых донесений, прочее — неведомый нам шифр. Впрочем, мы знаем, где искать истину — в системе Оденат-XI".

"Only a few words. 'Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. The winds have ceased. It is done.' Now 'Lillamedh' is Voigtvir's call sign for special reports, but the rest is a code we are unfamiliar with. That said, we know where to look for the truth: the Odaenathus XI System."
languages.original_text: "Всего несколько слов. "Лилламед. Оденат-XI. Ветра утихли. Исполнено". Лилламед — это и есть сигнатура Войгтвира для особых донесений, прочее — неведомый нам шифр. Впрочем, мы знаем, где искать истину — в системе Оденат-XI".

"Only a few words. 'Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. The winds have ceased. It is done.' Now 'Lillamedh' is Voigtvir's callsign for special reports, but the rest is a code we are unfamiliar with. That said, we know where to look for the truth: the Odaenathus XI System."

languages.text: «Solo unas palabras. "Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. Los vientos se han sosegado. Está hecho". Lillamedh es el código de Voigtvir para informes especiales, pero lo demás nos resulta desconocido. No obstante, sabemos dónde buscar la verdad: en el sistema Odaenathus XI».
languages.original_text: "Only a few words. 'Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. The winds have ceased. It is done.' Now 'Lillamedh' is Voigtvir's call sign for special reports, but the rest is a code we are unfamiliar with. That said, we know where to look for the truth: the Odaenathus XI System."

traits.locale_text: «Solo unas palabras. "Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. Los vientos se han sosegado. Está hecho". Lillamedh es el código de Voigtvir para informes especiales, pero lo demás nos resulta desconocido. No obstante, sabemos dónde buscar la verdad: en el sistema Odaenathus XI».

languages.text: 「ほんの少し言葉を確認できた。『リラメド、オダエナトゥス・XI、風は止む、それで終わり』。『リラメド』は、特別な報告がある時に使うボイドヴィルのコールサインだが、それ以外のコードはよく分からない。とはいえ、どこで真実が見つかるか分かったな。オダエナトゥス・XI星系だ」
languages.original_text: "Only a few words. 'Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. The winds have ceased. It is done.' Now 'Lillamedh' is Voigtvir's call sign for special reports, but the rest is a code we are unfamiliar with. That said, we know where to look for the truth: the Odaenathus XI System."

traits.locale_text: 「ほんの少し言葉を確認できた。『リラメド、オダエナトゥス・XI、風は止む、それで終わり』。『リラメド』は、特別な報告がある時に使うボイドヴィルのコールサインだが、それ以外のコードはよく分からない。とはいえ、どこで真実が見つかるか分かったな。オダエナトゥス・XI星系だ」

languages.text: “只有短短几句话：‘利拉梅德，奥登纳图斯十一号星。风已经停了，已经结束了。’目前我们确定的是，‘利拉梅德’是维特威尔内部使用的暗语，但其余部分的含义我们并不清楚。话虽如此，我们已经知道了该去哪里寻找真相——去奥登纳图斯十一号星。”
languages.original_text: "Only a few words. 'Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. The winds have ceased. It is done.' Now 'Lillamedh' is Voigtvir's call sign for special reports, but the rest is a code we are unfamiliar with. That said, we know where to look for the truth: the Odaenathus XI System."

traits.locale_text: “只有短短几句话：‘利拉梅德，奥登纳图斯十一号星。风已经停了，已经结束了。’目前我们确定的是，‘利拉梅德’是维特威尔内部使用的暗语，但其余部分的含义我们并不清楚。话虽如此，我们已经知道了该去哪里寻找真相——去奥登纳图斯十一号星。”

languages.text: "Nur einige wenige Worte. 'Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. Die Winde haben sich gelegt. Es ist vollbracht.' 'Lillamedh' ist Voigtvirs Rufzeichen für Sonderberichte, doch der Rest ist ein Code, der uns nicht bekannt ist. Aber wir wissen, wo wir nach der Wahrheit suchen müssen: Im System Odaenathus XI."
languages.original_text: "Only a few words. 'Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. The winds have ceased. It is done.' Now 'Lillamedh' is Voigtvir's call sign for special reports, but the rest is a code we are unfamiliar with. That said, we know where to look for the truth: the Odaenathus XI System."

traits.locale_text: "Nur einige wenige Worte. 'Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. Die Winde haben sich gelegt. Es ist vollbracht.' 'Lillamedh' ist Voigtvirs Rufzeichen für Sonderberichte, doch der Rest ist ein Code, der uns nicht bekannt ist. Aber wir wissen, wo wir nach der Wahrheit suchen müssen: Im System Odaenathus XI."

languages.text: « Il tient en quelques mots. "Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. Les vents sont retombés. Mission accomplie." Si "Lillamedh" n'est autre que l'identifiant employé par Voigtvir pour les rapports spéciaux, le code utilisé pour crypter le reste du message nous échappe. Cela étant dit, nous savons où chercher des réponses : dans le système d'Odaenathus XI. »
languages.original_text: "Only a few words. 'Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. The winds have ceased. It is done.' Now 'Lillamedh' is Voigtvir's call sign for special reports, but the rest is a code we are unfamiliar with. That said, we know where to look for the truth: the Odaenathus XI System."

traits.locale_text: « Il tient en quelques mots. "Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. Les vents sont retombés. Mission accomplie." Si "Lillamedh" n'est autre que l'identifiant employé par Voigtvir pour les rapports spéciaux, le code utilisé pour crypter le reste du message nous échappe. Cela étant dit, nous savons où chercher des réponses : dans le système d'Odaenathus XI. »

languages.text: "Sadece birkaç kelime yazıyor. 'Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. Rüzgârlar dindi. İş tamam.' Bu 'Lillamedh', özel raporlar için Voigtvir'in çağrı kodu. Ancak geri kalan kodlarla aşina değiliz. Bununla birlikte hakikati Odaenathus XI Sistemi'nde arayacağımızı biliyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Only a few words. 'Lillamedh. Odaenathus XI. The winds have ceased. It is done.' Now 'Lillamedh' is Voigtvir's call sign for special reports, but the rest is a code we are unfamiliar with. That said, we know where to look for the truth: the Odaenathus XI System."
